topic.title: How to Change the Application Name, Logo, and Favicon

body.p: It is possible to change the name of the application, the logo, and the favicon for your Oxygen Feedback interface. This can be achieved by changing the following properties in the config/feedback-application.properties file, setting their values according to your customization needs:################################################################## # Product branding configuration ################################################################## feedback.product.name=Oxygen Feedback feedback.product.logo.url=/images/appLogo.png feedback.product.favicon.url=/images/favicon.ico

Custom images can be placed in the [Oxygen-Feedback-Home]/data/images directory. Their path is referenced in the properties file with /images/... (without "/data"). For example, if you place an image in /data/images/logo.png, you need to reference it as /images/logo.png.
